entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:44 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 9:51 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening with risk of freezing rain. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then northwest 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
